Package io.hekate.cluster.split

Cluster split-brain detection API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SplitBrainDetector
    Cluster split-brain detector.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddressReachabilityDetector
    Socket address connectivity-based detector.
    HostReachabilityDetector
    Host reachability-based detector.
    JdbcConnectivityDetector
    JDBC connectivity-based detector.
    SplitBrainDetectorGroup
    Combination of multiple split-brain detectors.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SplitBrainAction
    Possible options for Split-brain resolution.
    SplitBrainDetectorGroup.GroupPolicy
    Group policy for SplitBrainDetectorGroup.
